channel.title: [525] i need a little help [525]
channel.description:
could someone leave a comment with links to a [525] client+server source that you can put models into pls!
i have been trying to get a good server and client for like a week now i i just cant find one i like and is "easy to edit" so yea pls HELP!
oh and a good [525] tutorial would be nice with help such as *how to make yourself owner* *how to add models* plus others !
oh and as soon as i get 15 rep i will add rep to who evr helps me the most

item.title: [525] i need a little help [525]
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“jordisun, post:1, topic:272565”]could someone leave a comment with links to a [525] client+server source that you can put models into pls!

i have been trying to get a good server and client for like a week now i i just cant find one i like and is “easy to edit” so yea pls HELP!

oh and a good [525] tutorial would be nice with help such as how to make yourself owner how to add models plus others !

rep ++ will be given to who ever helps me the most![/quote]

No it wont fact that you can not REP++ anybody untill you have 15 rep, please do not abuse the REp system, secondly if you want tuts look in the correct section.

Read full topic
